body: Resolved with __script_layer.py__ that provides generic implementation.
Could have independent directory services per leaf folders.
Relegated to future release.
Base implementation provided.
Rebuilding UI -> deprecated.
Solved.
Solved for `find`, consider other commands and generalize
Generalized
Append both to the cell along with Application. Still need to disambiguate.
Could learn from the user, after executing did you mean, get the file/ folder name and add it to your lexicon
Modify grammar so that the keys correspond to unix command keywords. Makes it easier while extracting args.
Will also have trouble with folders and files named as keywords (commands/verbs), eg. Open Source Projects.
@mayankk2308 could throw a popup like we get in mac, as to keep both, replace or cancel. Just an idea for later use.

@mayankk2308 
I have solved the keyword ambiguity issue
Nice work. Close this issue at will.
Duplicate of "create mapping" mentioned in [Future Improvements/Capabilities](https://github.com/mayankk2308/natural-language-unix/issues/21)
Hello sir!, thanks a lot, I'll start sketching :)
![mylogo 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38182512/43674423-7ddcadac-97f1-11e8-94e1-64394cdd2b0f.jpg)

Hello sir, sorry for the delay, the truth was not easy for me to generate an idea, I relied a bit on what he said, but I used another range of colors with more contrast. The main idea is "voice waves".

![universal](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35750428/43819811-e52ffef4-9aa9-11e8-8ae0-811a0ed5a995.png)
Thanks for your suggestion. However I feel these are not the best for a macOS app icon. Do let me know if you have any other suggestions later on 👍

Hello, here are my last two proposal sir. I hope you like them.

![universale](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35750428/43865058-09310eba-9b27-11e8-86bf-3ee73c8ad97f.png)
Hello, I would like to know your opinion about the latest designs I sent.

@ggabogarcia Like the icons, primarily the first one. Shape is more iOS-like than macOS; the latter is more flexible with respect to app icons. Some examples to consider: Atom's icon, Affinity Designer/Photo icons, etc - have non-standard yet great shape. What are your thoughts on somehow combining the first and second concept (waves + terminal) packaged into a somewhat unique shape?
Invalid with current structure.
This will not be an issue for the app binary.
Use of intent analysis may solve this issue.
Deprecated. Will use an organized database.
Decided.
The rename (`mv`) command will return a message about this on `stderr`. We can add this as an enhancement later.
